接口 RecipeIngredientMapper

public interface RecipeIngredientMapper
MyBatis mapper interface for RecipeIngredient entity operations. This interface defines database operations for managing recipe ingredients including adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving ingredients for recipes.
从以下版本开始:
1.0

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    boolean
    addRecipeIngredient(RecipeIngredient recipeIngredient)
    Adds a new recipe ingredient to the database.
    boolean
    deleteRecipeIngredient(Integer recipeID)
    Deletes all ingredients for a specific recipe.
    List<RecipeIngredient>
    getRecipeIngredientsByRecipeId(int recipeId)
    Retrieves all ingredients for a specific recipe.
    boolean
    updateRecipeIngredient(RecipeIngredient recipeIngredient)
    Updates an existing recipe ingredient in the database.

  • 方法详细资料

    • addRecipeIngredient

      boolean addRecipeIngredient(@Param("recipeIngredient") RecipeIngredient recipeIngredient)
      Adds a new recipe ingredient to the database.
      参数:
      recipeIngredient - the RecipeIngredient object to be added
      返回:
      true if the addition was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteRecipeIngredient

      boolean deleteRecipeIngredient(@Param("recipeID") Integer recipeID)
      Deletes all ingredients for a specific recipe. This method is typically used when updating recipe ingredients.
      参数:
      recipeID - the ID of the recipe whose ingredients should be deleted
      返回:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • updateRecipeIngredient

      boolean updateRecipeIngredient(@Param("recipeIngredient") RecipeIngredient recipeIngredient)
      Updates an existing recipe ingredient in the database.
      参数:
      recipeIngredient - the RecipeIngredient object with updated information
      返回:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • getRecipeIngredientsByRecipeId

      List<RecipeIngredient> getRecipeIngredientsByRecipeId(@Param("recipeId") int recipeId)
      Retrieves all ingredients for a specific recipe.
      参数:
      recipeId - the ID of the recipe to get ingredients for
      返回:
      a list of RecipeIngredient objects for the specified recipe
